edu.utexas.cs.tamerProject.agents.tamerrl
Class HInfluence

java.lang.Object
  edu.utexas.cs.tamerProject.agents.tamerrl.HInfluence

public class HInfluence
extends java.lang.Object

HInfluence calculates a parameter (beta in the ICML-11 workshop paper) that determines the relative influence of the model of human reward for TAMER+RL.

This class implements both simple annealing, starting at COMP_PARAM, and the more complex eligibility module, which outputs a parameter in range [0, COMB_PARAM]. See TamerRLAgent for an example of how to use this class.
